verses.name: 1 Samuel 1:17
verses.text: Then Eli answered and said, Go in peace: and the God of Israel grant thee thy petition that thou hast asked of him.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 1:18
verses.text: And she said, Let thine handmaid find grace in thy sight. So the woman went her way, and did eat, and her countenance was no more sad.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 1:19
verses.text: And they rose up in the morning early, and worshipped before the Lord, and returned, and came to their house to Ramah: and Elkanah knew Hannah his wife; and the Lord remembered her.
